title: cgo: inconsistent definitions for C type not quite fixed
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

GOARCH=amd64 cgo -- foo.go bar.go

What do you see instead?

inconsistent definitions for C type _Ctypedef_pthread_mutex_t

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

85cbc14414ab tip

Please provide any additional information below.

Related to issue #1222.

http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c3b10fce42
Attachments: 1. foo.go (133 bytes) 1. bar.go (155 bytes) 1. verbs.h (243 bytes)
